fixes.name: Delta Down All CCY Parallel
fixes.dax_expression: COALESCE('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down All CCY 3M], 0) + COALESCE('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down All CCY 6M], 0) + COALESCE('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down All CCY 9M], 0) + COALESCE('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down All CCY 1Y], 0) + COALESCE('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down All CCY 2Y], 0) + COALESCE('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down All CCY 5Y], 0) + COALESCE('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down All CCY 10Y], 0) + COALESCE('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down All CCY 30Y], 0)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced Tableau ZN(...) with DAX COALESCE(..., 0) and converted all field references to the 'Table'[Column] format. The original Tableau expression is a row-level sum of multiple calculated fields, so no aggregations or parameters are introduced in the DAX.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation performs row-level summation of other row-level calculated fields without aggregation or parameters, so it should be a calculated column.
